original_text: When they had carried out all that was written about him, they took him down from the cross and laid him in a tomb.
korean_text: 성경에 그를 가리켜 기록한 말씀을 다 응하게 한 것이라 후에 나무에서 내려다가 무덤에 두었으나

sentences.original_text: When they had carried out all that was written about him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에 대해 기록된 모든 것을 이행했을 때

sentences.original_text: they took him down from the cross
and laid him in a tomb
